Hello Cebu!

We are software developers, tech leaders, QA engineers and generally nerds in Cebu.

Our mission is to help create a strong tech community here in the Visayas.

Come say hi at a meetup, shoot us questions, or just roam around the site.

The website is hosted on GitHub, so please fork and help us improve it.

Where to next:

The following might be of interest to you:

  • Find out which software companies have called Cebu their home.
  • Look for places to do your work.
  • If you are a student or recently graduated, you might be interested in an internship.
  • Find events or groups to hang-out with.
  • Or, just want to do some coding, please checkout our Github repo.
  • Or, you want to chat, you can try our mailing list, Facebook Group, or Gitter chat room.
